title: WATCH: SAA chief pilot gives News24 an insider's view of inauguration flyover
text:
More areas in the Knysna region have been evacuated following a series of raging fires that have set the area ablaze on Wednesday. Four deaths have been reported. WATCH

Chief Pilot Vusi Khumalo is still on cloud nine.

Chief Pilot Vusi Khumalo is still on cloud nine.

His team gave a show-stopping aerial performance at the presidential inauguration last month.

Khumalo, who has more than 30 years of aviation experience, said they had spent more than a month preparing for the showcase event.

The team consisted of seven pilots, who flew two Airbus A340-600s.

The commercial jetliner is a four-engine aeroplane, that is 75.6m long and 70m high.

And ideally it can take about 375 passengers.
description: Chief Pilot Vusi Khumalo is still on cloud nine after his team gave a show-stopping aerial performance at the presidential inauguration last month.
